title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist
OB: Under certain circumstances, the code assist feature is eating too much code. In the bar method of the provided class X, the baz call is missing a parameter.
EB: The code assist feature should only replace the necessary code when adding a parameter to the baz call in the bar method. Specifically, it should add the missing parameter without removing any existing code.
SR:
1. Open the provided class X.
2. In the bar method, add a parameter to the baz call.
